sentences.english: And when Mr. Clinton visits a restaurant, everybody in the room knows it.
sentences.chinese: 只要克林顿一踏进餐厅，所有的食客就能立即认出他。

sentences.english: It has been revealed that diners in the two American cities are the lowest tippers in the country.
sentences.chinese: 数据显示这两大城市的食客们是全美给小费最少的。

sentences.english: My Cuisine Pioneer assignment was the Round Table Steak House.
sentences.chinese: 这次先锋食客被安排在圆桌武士牛排屋。

sentences.english: Old-time diners were built in a factory and transported to their place of business.
sentences.chinese: 老食客是建立在工厂和运输，他们的营业地点。

sentences.english: This law should have implemented long before. I hate pan masala eates.
sentences.chinese: 这个法律早就该实施了，我讨厌吃马沙拉的食客。

sentences.english: The homemade fois gras (goose liver on toast) with sweet jam was deliciously tender, explaining its a popularity among regular patrons.
sentences.chinese: 自制的鹅肝酱配上甜甜的果酱温和深受食客亲睐。

sentences.english: Since last week, many people have gone there to taste the pot earlier than the mass.
sentences.chinese: 而上周开始，羊锅村里已有不少赶早尝鲜的食客。

sentences.english: The dish has previously caused diners to suffer nose bleeds and one elderly man had to go to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜曾导致食客流鼻血，一个老人甚至被送进医院。

sentences.english: Excellent flavor, the market is extremely difficult to imitate, diners are all left a deep impression after tasting.
sentences.chinese: 风味绝佳，市场极难仿制，食客品尝后无不拍手叫绝。

sentences.english: In the elegant light, it naturally brings diner good complexion ruddy.
sentences.chinese: 在雅致的光线之下，自然而然带给食客红润好气色。

sentences.english: Rich people are often surrounded by hangers-on.
sentences.chinese: 富人经常被食客所包围。

sentences.english: Two diners at the lunch table speak animatedly.
sentences.chinese: 两名食客在午餐桌上发言热烈。

sentences.english: You know all those people taking pictures of their food at restaurants?
sentences.chinese: 你了解所有那些在餐厅里为食物拍摄图片的食客吗？

definition: proprietor of a shop or restaurant/landlord/shop
signature dish/a restaurant’s most famous dish
